description.value:
The green mist contained in this glass globe can make dreams and memories seem real.

Level: 4
Category: Alchemical Item (Poison)
Time: 1 hour
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Formula Cost: 250 gp
Key Skill: Nature or Thievery

Attack Power (Poison) âœ¦ Consumable (Standard Action)

Attack: Ranged 2/5 (one creature); the item's level + 3 vs. Will

Hit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn. While dazed, the target takes a -5 penalty to Insight checks to resist Bluff attempts or to recognize effects as illusory, and the target is not aware that this attack has been made against it.



Published in Mordenkainen's Magnificent Emporium, page(s) 130.
